text: @senatemajldr "McConnell emerged...with a bill that would provide...help for...executives & shareholders, & not nearly enough for American workers. It would let the Treasury...[give] hundreds of billions...to corporations...including [those] owned by [Dictator] Trump" https://t.co/ej4g1HRv6m
